     <h2>What is the international acronym for each of these two weight or mass units?</h2> 
     <p>Prefix or symbol for kilogram is: <strong>kg</strong></p> 
     <p>Prefix or symbol for pound is: <strong>lb , lbs</strong></p> 
     <p><b>Technical units conversion tool for weight or mass measures.</b> Exchange reading in <b>kilograms unit kg</b> into <b>pounds unit lb , lbs</b> as in an equivalent measurement result (two different units but the same identical physical total value, which is also equal to their proportional parts when divided or multiplied).</p> 
     <h3>One kilogram converted into pound equals = 2.20 lb , lbs</h3> 
     <h3>1 kg = 2.20 lb , lbs</h3>
